knimeNode.name: FeatureCountsStatisticMerger
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node can be used to merge statistics of the featureCounts node.

fullDescription.intro: The FeatureCountsStatisticMerger can be used to merge the statistics of multiple featureCounts runs into one file in order to post-process that data.

option.name: Path to folder with featureCounts Outputs

fullDescription.option: The node searches recursively all folders and sub-folders of the input directory for output files of a featureCounts run.
Set the path to the output folder, where the output files should be stored. The output files will be named after the selected modules.
Select by which modules the data should be merged. At least one module must be selected.

ports.outPort:
Cell 0: Name of the module
Cell 1: Path to the merged file
Cell 0: Path to the FeatureCounts output files which were merged
